That's unfortunate, we will fire her immediately
I suppose. Thanks for checking in.
let me know these messages received. thank you.

here is another test message for API calls.
this should work. send messages as read please test.
let me know if messages getting marked read.
test. did you remove all the opportunities /sessions for your account?

sorry, this is the developer. testing the messages ui/ux.  please disregard.

Let us know if you need anything!

scheduleItems.Title: PM: Drift Trikes
scheduleItems.Description: For those not attending our workshop we are offering drift trikes at the firehouse. Our staff will walk the group over and return them back.
scheduleItems.LongDescription: Enter a detailed rich text description of the event. See a preview on the right.

scheduleItems.Title: Black Light Dodgeball
scheduleItems.Description: Join us for an epic game starting at 9:00 pm and going until 9:45 pm. If there is not enough people for a game we can have an epic Blacklight Dance Party.
scheduleItems.LongDescription:
Join us tonight from 9:00 to 9:45pm for an epic round of Blacklight Dodgeball—where the lights go out and the glow takes over. We’ll crank up the music, light up the court, and let the dodgeballs fly under the blacklights. It’s fast-paced, high-energy, and guaranteed to be a blast.

And hey, if we don’t have enough for a full-on game, no problem—we’ll flip the vibe and throw a spontaneous glow-in-the-dark dance party. Whether you"re dodging, dancing, or just vibing, it"s going to be a night to remember.

Bring your best moves, your fastest reflexes, and your neon gear. Let’s make it electric.

scheduleItems.Title: Welcome Activities
scheduleItems.Description: When you arrive, head over to New Mexico Hall with your family to kick off your adventure-filled session. Enjoy yard games, pickleball, and even inflatables for some fun right from the start!
